subject: Horse Racing
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The trainer Kiaran McLaughlin said he would not challenge a 30-day suspension for violating horse medication rules in Kentucky, although he insisted he was trying to prevent his horses from coughing, not give them an edge.
snippet: The trainer Kiaran McLaughlin said he would not challenge a 30-day suspension for violating horse medication rules in Kentucky, although he insisted he was trying to prevent his horses from coughing, not give them an edge.
